English.Text: She fascinates the warriors, almost as much as they fascinate her. "Many stray into our territories, rarely does a woman lead them," says the tallest of the goddesses. Neither she nor the others make further mention of these territories, how far they span, or if their people dwell in towns and cities. Your crew are invited to share in what they have found however. As the women lope into the trees, eyes ever watchful, you wonder how they will repurpose all they have harvested from these ruins. For it is your belief they may have stumbled into this chaos, from a distant, more noble age.
